channel.title: Northeast - Colony (slowed)
channel.description:
I was tinkering around a bit and I lowered the pitch on Colony, one of the songs I made a while back, and I liked the way it sounded. Then I decided to slow it down and add a bit more reverb to it, and one thing led to another, here we are!
https://app.auxy.co/projects/WVLuSUzCvHskYzK89o3oeQ==
Unfortunately now I don’t have the original Colony project, so the only reference I can give y’all is the one I posted on SC:
https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/5FDtyh8Q8rFRjDmC9
Lmk which one you like better, and why. Your opinion helps. Thanks!
